rules.description: Use right_command+;/' to cycle through running applications (like command+tab).
Use right_command+h/l to switch tabs in an application.
Use right_command+j/k to switch windows of the foreground application .
Quit application by pressing command-q twice
Quit Safari by pressing command-q twice
Change ctrl+delete to forward delete word
right option + . or / to move to previous/next display
Ctrl + h/j to navigato to next unread
Change ctrl+delete to forward delete word
Quit application by pressing command-q twice
